pr_title: Search fix: query_string regex searches not working on wildcard fields

timeline.message:
First cut to fix wildcard field +query_string issue.

Tests to follow - just checking this doesn’t break things here

Closes #60957
Use super() impl rather than fieldType if forceAnalyzer set (for BWC purposes)
Temp change to force error so I can get a “reproduce with” example
Added extra conditions to the case where we don’t delegate wildcard query construction to the underlying field type

timeline.author: jimczi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -158,6 +158,33 @@ setup:
 
   - match: {hits.total.value: 1}
 
+---
+"Query_string wildcard query":
+  - do:
+      search:
+        body:
+          track_total_hits: true
+          query:
+            query_string:
+              query: "hello*"

timeline.message: Add query_string wildcard query test, rename prefix test
